variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: GENEVA IDs were randomly assigned to all subjects included in the phenotype dataset. This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: FATHER
variable.description: Father ID (equal to GENEVA ID when father is also a subject). Nine-digit number = GENEVA ID; <3 digit integer = arbitrary identifier
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.description: Mother ID (equal to GENEVA ID when mother is also a subject). Nine-digit number = GENEVA ID; <3 digit integer = arbitrary identifier
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: SEX
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: PED.NOTE
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.
variable.value: Family members have half-sib-like relationship (i.e. half-sibling, avuncular, grandparent-grandchild)

variable.name: CORIELL.ID
variable.description: Coriell ID for HapMap subjects ("NA"+5 digits = Coriell ID)
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.
